Articles.Content:
I haven't seen this posted anywhere, and if it is then I apologize.

I'm having problems with the competition mode with bdarmory, every time I set a competition they just fly towards each other and nothing happen, help please

Hello, and welcome to the forums!

24 minutes ago, The unique hope nu said:

I'm having problems with the competition mode with bdarmory, every time I set a competition they just fly towards each other and nothing happen, help please

If you've got an issue with a specific mod, probably the best place to ask about it is in the mod's thread in "Add-on Releases", since that's where all the expert users (and author!) of the mod generally hang out.  Perhaps better to ask the question there?
Need to set team A vs Team B on the BD module.

My suggestion is to start the game, open a save game or start a new one then click on the KSPedia (little blue book, right hand lower corner of screen) and read the BDPedia

Most of the time reading the manual tends to help 

If you have further issues feel free to comment in the BDAc thread where myself and the team as well as the many BDAc experts will be glad to help get you up and running

 

Edited July 28, 2018 by DoctorDavinci
